sentences.text: The CEOs  recommendations are based in part on the results of annual  performance reviews of the other executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee is not bound by such recommendations but  generally takes them into consideration before making final  determinations about the compensation of such executives  other than our CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, these officers present our CEOs  recommendations regarding any change in the base salary,  bonus, equity compensation, goals related to performance- based cash or equity compensation and other benefits of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 42 STAPLES Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION AND COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO, at the discretion of the Committee, may be invited  to attend all or part of any Committee meeting to discuss  compensation matters pertaining to the other executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2016, Mr. Sargent attended the regularly scheduled  compensation committee meetings in March and June.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Goodman attended the regularly scheduled meetings in  June and December.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When discussing compensation matters  pertaining to our CEO, the Committee generally meets in  executive sessions with its independent compensation  consultant without any member of management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration of Incentive Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Committee, through delegated powers,  have broad discretion in administering the cash and stock  incentive plans under which new awards may be made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This  discretion includes the authority to grant awards, determine  target awards, and select performance objectives and goals,  along with the ability to adopt, amend and repeal such  administrative rules, guidelines and practices as deemed  advisable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Committee has broad discretion  to modify awards and determine goal attainment and the  payment of awards under our current plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has delegated authority to the Chairman and CEO  to grant stock options and restricted stock units and, in his  capacity as Chairman, restricted stock to non-executive  employees out of an annual pool of 600,000 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given our  appointment of an independent Chairman in 2017, the Board  expects to revisit this delegation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual pool is designed to be used between quarterly  Committee meetings to facilitate making new hire and  retention grants and to reward special accomplishments and  achievements of associates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards from the annual pool are  granted on the earlier of the first business day of the month  that follows appropriate approval or two business days after  the Committees ratification of the award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards from this  pool cannot be granted to executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may determine to what extent, if any, specific  items are to be counted in the relevant financial measures  for any particular business and whether special one-time  or extraordinary gains and/or losses and/or extraordinary  events should or should not be included or considered in the  calculation of goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee can decrease but not  increase incentive awards for NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk Assessment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the December 2016 meeting, the Committee conducted  its annual risk assessment of our executive officer  compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The evaluation included an analysis  of the appropriateness of our peer group, compensation mix,  performance metrics, performance goals and payout curves,  payment timing and adjustments, equity incentives, stock  ownership guidelines/trading policies, performance appraisal  process and leadership/culture.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Committee  reviewed the major compensation plans with regard to risk  mitigators attributable to each of the programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risk mitigators included the balanced mix of cash and  equity incentives, the mix and quality of the performance  metrics, the stock ownership guidelines and a broad  recoupment policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also considered and  reviewed the input from participants in our corporate  governance outreach program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its evaluation and recognizing that all compensation  programs are inherently risk laden, the Committee determined  that the level of risk within our compensation programs was  appropriate and did not encourage excessive risk taking by  our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the Committee concluded that  our compensation programs are not reasonably likely to have  a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within five years of becoming an officer of the Company, our  senior executives must attain minimum ownership of Staples  common stock equal in value to no less than a defined multiple  of their salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The applicable multiples for Company officers are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Presidents: 3x Salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Executive Officers: 1 - 2x Salary1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of January 28, 2017, all senior executives had achieved  the minimum ownership except for Ms. Goodman and  Ms. Komola, who were both within their phase-in period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Komola subsequently satisfied the minimum ownership  requirement in March 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO: 5x Salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CFO: 4x Salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1   The stock ownership guidelines do not apply to Mr. Conte as  he is not a member of our senior leadership team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recoupment Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual cash bonus plans, long term incentive plans and  agreements and severance arrangements provide for forfeiture  and recovery of undeserved cash, equity and severance  compensation from any associate that engages in certain  particularly harmful or unethical behaviors such as intentional
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: deceitful acts resulting in improper personal benefit or injury  to the company, fraud or willful misconduct that significantly  contributes to a material financial restatement, violation of the  Code of Ethics and breach of key associate agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: www.staplesannualmeeting.com STAPLES 43
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION AND COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hedging and Pledging Company Securities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hedging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Insider Trading Policy prohibits, among many  other actions, our associates and directors from entering into  derivative transactions such as puts, calls, or hedges with  our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pledging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Insider Trading Policy prohibits the use of  Staples securities as collateral in margin accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However,  in limited circumstances, pledging of Staples securities  for bona fide loans which may require such securities as  collateral may be allowed, provided such pledge is cleared  with the General Counsel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the past five years, the General  Counsel has not cleared, or been asked to clear, any pledge  of Staples securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax and Accounting Implications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Section 162(m) of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code,  certain executive compensation in excess of $1 million paid  to our CEO and to our three most highly compensated officers  (other than the CEO and CFO) whose compensation is required  to be disclosed to our stockholders under the Securities  Exchange Act of 1934, is not deductible for federal income  tax purposes unless the executive compensation is awarded  under a performance-based plan approved by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All annual cash incentive awards and performance shares  awarded to our NEOs are paid pursuant to plans approved  by our stockholders and are potentially deductible by  us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time-based restricted stock does not qualify for the  performance-based exception to Section 162(m), but the  Committee has determined that the retention benefit derived  from such awards outweighs any potential tax benefit to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation that we pay to our NEOs is expensed  in our financial statements as required by U.S. generally  accepted accounting principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As one of many factors,  the Committee considers the financial statement impact  in determining the amount of, and allocation among the  elements of, compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock-based compensation  is accounted for as required under FASB ASC Topic 718.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To maintain flexibility in compensating executive officers in a  manner designed to promote varying corporate goals, the  Committee has not adopted a policy that all compensation  must be deductible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviews the impact of  Section 162(m) and intends, to the extent it determines to  be practicable, to preserve deductibility under the Internal  Revenue Code of compensation paid to our executive officers  when consistent with our goal of utilizing compensation  programs that attract and retain key executives and align with  stockholder interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees objective was to maintain a strong link between pay and performance and to continue to motivate our executives  to execute on the key priorities of the strategic plan.

sentences.text: The Committee reaffirmed its commitment to pay for performance and the  compensation philosophy established in 2013.

sentences.text: Vesting Provisions of Plan-Based Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Compensation Program:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Death or Disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a NEOs death or  disability, performance shares will vest and be paid out  at the end of the performance period, to the extent the  performance objectives are met, as if the NEO were  employed on such date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Cash Incentive Plan Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments of annual cash  incentive plan awards under the Executive Officer Incentive  Plan are determined based on achievement of performance  goals and continued service to Staples.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the  following provisions apply:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change-in-Control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, in connection with a change-in- control,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the NEO does not accept employment with  the surviving corporation upon the change-in-control or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) within one year following the change-in-control, the  NEOs employment is terminated without cause (or the  NEO resigns for good reason), the NEO is entitled to  receive the greater of the target number of shares or the  shares earned based on achievement of the performance  objectives and TSR multiplier.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a NEO terminates his employment before  the end of a performance period and if the NEO has  satisfied the Rule of 65 requirements (attainment of age  55 plus years of service to Staples is equal to or greater  than 65), then the NEO is eligible for a prorated award  based on the number of days the NEO was employed  during the plan year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A prorated award will only be paid out  if the Compensation Committee certifies achievement of  the objectives and the payouts at the end of the plan year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Units vest in three  equal installments over a three-year period, with one-third of  the underlying shares vesting on each anniversary of the grant  date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the following provisions apply:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a NEOs death before the end of the plan  year, annual cash incentive plan awards will be paid out at  100% of the target award, regardless of the amount that  would have been earned based upon achievement of the  performance goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination of Employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All unvested Restricted Stock  Units are forfeited if a NEO ceases to be an employee  of, or consultant to, Staples, except in connection with  retirement under certain circumstances described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a NEOs employment is terminated due to  disability before the end of the plan year, then the NEO  is eligible for a prorated award based on the number  of days the NEO was employed during the plan year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prorated awards will only be paid out if the Compensation  Committee certifies achievement of the objectives and the  payouts at the end of the plan year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Death, Disability or Retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a NEOs  death, disability or retirement after reaching the age of 65,  any unvested Restricted Stock Units shall vest in full.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change-in-Control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If within one year following a change- in-control, a NEOs employment is terminated without  cause (or the NEO resigns for good reason), any unvested  Restricted Stock Units shall vest in full.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination of Employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than as described  above, all annual cash incentive plan awards are forfeited  upon termination of employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Option Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under certain circumstances, the time-based  vesting of stock options, which were granted to NEOs prior to  2013, may be accelerated or the awards may be forfeited as  described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance share awards are earned  based on achievement of performance objectives for each  year of the performance period, but do not fully vest until the  three-year performance period is completed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the  following provisions apply:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement or Resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a NEO retires or resigns and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the age of 65 has been attained, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the age and  years of service requirements of our Rule of 65 have been  satisfied, then all stock option awards vest in full.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination of Employment by Staples, Retirement or  Resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a NEO is terminated other than for cause  (as defined in the award agreement) or the NEO retires  or resigns and the age and years of service requirements  of our Rule of 65 have been satisfied, then the NEO may  be eligible to receive
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) shares earned for completed  fiscal years within the performance period and, for partial  fiscal years during which the named executive officer was  employed by Staples, a pro rata portion based on the  days employed by Staples, as adjusted by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the TSR  multiplier.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prorated awards will only be paid out if the  Compensation Committee certifies achievement of the  objectives and the payouts will be made at the end of the  applicable performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination of Employment by Staples.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All unvested stock  options are forfeited if a NEO is terminated by Staples,  regardless of whether such termination was for cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Death or Disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stock options vest in full upon a  NEOs death or disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change-in-Control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our standard form of non- qualified stock option agreement, a change-in-control  would result in a partial vesting acceleration of  outstanding options and a termination without cause  (or resignation for good reason) within one year after a  change-in-control would result in acceleration of vesting  of all remaining options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination for Cause by Staples.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All performance shares are forfeited if a NEO is terminated for cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with Section 14A of the Exchange Act, our  Board is asking shareholders to approve, on an advisory basis,  Staples named executive officer compensation by approving  the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON THE FREQUENCY OF  FUTURE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION ADVISORY  VOTES (ITEM 3 ON THE PROXY CARD)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described in proposal 2 above, stockholders are provided  an opportunity to cast an advisory vote on Staples executive  compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with Section 14A of the  Exchange Act, this proposal 3 provides stockholders with an  opportunity to cast a non-binding advisory vote regarding the  frequency of future executive compensation advisory votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may vote for a frequency of every one, two or  three years, or may abstain from casting a vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is consistent with managements and the Compensation  Committees annual review of our executive compensation  program, and with our current practice based on the results of our previous advisory vote on frequency in 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also believes that an annual vote will facilitate more direct  stockholder input about executive compensation, as well as,  reflect Staples generally open and responsive attitude towards stockholders concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that advisory votes on executive  compensation should be conducted every year so that  stockholders may annually express their views on Staples  executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OUR BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS  THAT YOU VOTE FOR A FREQUENCY OF 1 YEAR  FOR  FUTURE  EXECUTIVE  COMPENSATION  ADVISORY VOTES.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 56 STAPLES Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPROVAL OF AMENDED AND RESTATED  EXECUTIVE OFFICER INCENTIVE PLAN   (ITEM 4 ON THE PROXY CARD)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are seeking stockholder approval of our amended and  restated Executive Officer Incentive Plan, which we refer to as  the Annual Cash Plan, in order to obtain favorable corporate  tax treatment for payments earned under this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Annual Cash Plan is designed to provide opportunities for  participants to earn financial rewards for their role in ensuring  that the Company meets its annual performance targets and  to align the interests of the participants with those of our  stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Cash Plan was last approved by  stockholders in 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information about our annual  cash incentive award program for our executive officers, see  the "Compensation Discussion and Analysis" section of this  proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: made from 2012 to 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee  determined to make the following changes in connection with  the amendment and restatement of the Annual Cash Plan:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Extended the term of the Annual Cash Plan through fiscal year 2021.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provided flexibility in setting the length of performance  periods under the Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather than only  having the full fiscal year available as a performance  period, the Compensation Committee may now set  multiple, shorter periods of time to constitute the  performance periods in any given fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requirement  for  Stockholder  Approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under  Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as  amended (the Code), certain executive compensation in  excess of $1 million per year paid to some of our executive  officers would generally not be deductible for federal income  tax purposes unless such compensation is paid under a  performance-based plan that is approved by our stockholders  and satisfies certain other criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is therefore  submitting the Annual Cash Plan for stockholder approval in  order to avail itself of the performance based compensation  exception to the deduction limitations under Section 162(m)  of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that it is important for  stockholders to approve the amended and restated  Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clarified that performance goals under the Annual  Cash Plan may be calculated on a Generally Accepted  Accounting Principles (GAAP) or non-GAAP basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provided flexibility for the Compensation Committee to  set differing minimum performance goals in any given  performance period by removing the requirement to  always have a minimum Earnings Per Share goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017, the Compensation Committee took advantage  of the flexibility afforded by the Annual Cash Plan, as amended  and restated, in setting performance periods to divide the  fiscal year into two six-month periods, and established goals  for awards under the Annual Cash Plan for the first half of fiscal  2017 subject to stockholder approval, as further described  below under Annual Cash Plan Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If stockholders do  not approve the Annual Cash Plan, then no payment will be  made with respect to such awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposed Changes to the Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual  Cash Plan is substantially similar to the plan approved by our stockholders in 2012, and pursuant to which our  annual incentive plan awards to executive officers have been
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Description of the Annual Cash Plan (as Proposed to be Amended and  Restated)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a brief summary of the material terms of the  Annual Cash Plan as proposed to be amended and restated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following summary is qualified in all respects by reference  to the Annual Cash Plan, which is attached as Appendix A to  this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our executive officers, within the meaning  of the rules and regulations promulgated by the Securities  and Exchange Commission, will be eligible to participate in  the Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We currently have 8 executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An executive officer whose employment terminates before  the end of a Plan Period, other than as a result of permanent  disability, death or retirement, will not be eligible to receive a  bonus award under the Annual Cash Plan for that Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Term of Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Cash Plan will cover five fiscal  years (or portions thereof), beginning with our 2017 fiscal year  and ending with our 2021 fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to each such  fiscal year or portion of a fiscal year in which performance is  measured as a "Plan Period."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Determination of Bonus Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each executive officer  will have a target bonus award (a "Target Award") for each  Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target Awards will be expressed as a percentage  of the actual base salary paid to the executive officer during  that Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The percentages will be determined by the  Compensation Committee based upon the executive officers  job level and responsibilities and may vary for different officers  and business units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Cash Plan will be administered  by the Compensation Committee of our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee will have broad authority to  determine target bonuses, select performance objectives,  adopt rules and regulations relating to the Annual Cash  Plan, and make decisions and interpretations regarding the  provisions of the Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: www.staplesannualmeeting.com STAPLES 57
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPROVAL OF AMENDED AND RESTATED EXECUTIVE OFFICER INCENTIVE PLAN (ITEM 4 ON THE PROXY CARD)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amendments and Termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Cash Plan  may be amended or terminated by either our Board or the  Compensation Committee, provided that (1) no amendment  or termination of the Annual Cash Plan after the end of a Plan  Period may adversely affect the rights of executive officers with  respect to their bonus awards for that Plan Period and (2) no  amendment which would require stockholder approval under  Section 162(m) of the Code may be effected without such  stockholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within the earlier of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) 90 days after the beginning of each  Plan Period and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the first 25% of the Plan Period, the  Compensation Committee will establish specific performance  objectives for the payment of bonus awards for that Plan  Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance objectives for each Plan Period  will be based on one or more of the following measures  which may be determined in accordance with GAAP or on  a non-GAAP basis: sales, earnings per share, return on net  assets, return on equity, adjusted operating profit, free cash  flow, total shareholder return, net income, operating income  and customer service levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee  may determine that special one-time or extraordinary gains  or losses, including without limitation as a result of certain  acquisitions or divestitures and changes in accounting  principles, should or should not be included in determining  whether such performance objectives have been met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recoupment; Dodd-Frank Clawback.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Compensation  Committee determines during the course of a participants  employment or during a period of time following termination  of employment, that a participant engaged in certain harmful  or unethical behavior, the Compensation Committee may,  in addition to terminating the participants participation in  the Annual Cash Plan and requiring forfeiture of outstanding  awards, require repayment by the participant of certain  amounts paid under the Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in  accordance with any requirements of the Dodd-Frank Act and  any policy adopted by the Company with respect thereto, if the  Company is required to prepare an accounting restatement  due to material noncompliance of the Company with any  financial reporting requirement under the securities laws, then  the Company shall require the participants to return to the  Company, or forfeit if not yet paid, the amount of any award  received under the Annual Cash Plan during the three-year  period preceding the date on which the Company is required  to prepare the accounting restatement in excess of what  would have been paid to the participant under the accounting  restatement as determined by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each Plan Period, a specified percentage of each Target  Award will be based upon each of the performance objectives  selected by the Compensation Committee for that Plan  Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each of the performance objectives, a specified  percentage of the portion of the Target Award that is based on  that particular performance objective will be paid based on the  level of performance achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each performance objective  has a threshold performance level that must be achieved for  any of the bonus award to be paid for such objective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an  executive officer dies before the end of a Plan Period, however,  a bonus award based on target performance will be paid within  60 days of the executive officers death, and will be annualized  if the Plan Period does not cover the entire fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum bonus award payable to any executive officer  for any fiscal year will be $4 million, with such amount  proportionally allocated among all Plan Periods within such  fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Compensation Committee presently  intends to limit bonus awards to 200% of an executive officers  Target Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Cash Plan Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 First Half Awards include sales and operating income  performance goals for the first half of fiscal year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As  described above, the payment of any amount under the 2017  First Half Awards is contingent on stockholders approving the  Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, no payments pursuant to the  2017 First Half Awards will be made unless the applicable  performance goals are satisfied, and Staples achieves a  minimum EPS threshold amount for the full fiscal year to be  determined by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The grant of awards under the Annual Cash Plan is  discretionary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than as described below, the Company  cannot now determine the number or type of awards to be  granted in the future to any particular participant or group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 First Half Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee  approved in March 2017, subject to stockholder approval,  awards under the Annual Cash Plan for the first half of fiscal  2017 (the 2017 First Half Awards).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The target compensation  under the 2017 First Half Awards represents one-third of the  total target compensation payable under the Annual Cash  Plan to each executive officer, with the other two-thirds to  be payable in connection with the awards for the second half  of fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We typically collect a higher proportion of our  annual revenue in the second half of our fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Federal Income Tax Consequences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following  generally summarizes the United States federal income  tax consequences that will arise with respect to the Annual  Cash Plan, but it is not a detailed or complete description of  all U.S. federal tax laws or regulations that may apply, and  does not address any local, state or foreign laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore,  no one should rely on this summary for individual tax  compliance, planning or decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants in the  Annual Cash Plan should consult their own professional  tax advisors concerning tax aspects of participating in  the Annual Cash Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments received by executive officers under the Annual  Cash Plan will be income subject to tax at ordinary income  rates when received.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since the Annual Cash Plan is intended to  comply with the requirements of Section 162(m) of the Code,  if the Annual Cash Plan is approved by stockholders at the  Annual Meeting, then bonus payments made in accordance  with the terms of the Annual Cash Plan will be deductible for  the Company and will not be subject to disallowance under  Section 162(m) of the Code.

sentences.text: RATIFICATION OF SELECTION OF INDEPENDENT  REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM   (ITEM 5 ON THE PROXY CARD)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee is directly responsible  for appointing, compensating, overseeing, evaluating and,  when necessary, terminating our independent registered  public accounting firm, and our independent registered  public accounting firm reports directly to the Audit and  Finance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee of our  Board has appointed the firm of Ernst & Young LLP as our  independent registered public accounting firm for the current  fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP has served as our independent  auditor since our inception.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee  evaluates the performance of our independent auditors,  including the senior audit engagement team, each year and  determines whether to reengage the current independent  auditors or consider other audit firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, in conjunction  with the mandated rotation of the audit firm's lead engagement  partner, the Audit and Finance Committee and its chairman  are directly involved in the selection of Ernst & Young's new  lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of the Audit and  Finance Committee and the Board believe that the continued  retention of Ernst &Young LLP to serve as our independent  auditor is in the best interests of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although shareholder approval of the Audit and Finance  Committees selection of Ernst & Young LLP is not required by  law, our Board believes that it is advisable to give shareholders  an opportunity to ratify this selection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If this proposal is not  approved at the Annual Meeting, the Audit and Finance  Committee may reconsider its selection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Ernst & Young LLP are expected to  be present at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will have the  opportunity to make a statement if they desire to do so and  will also be available to respond to appropriate questions  from shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: REPORT OF THE AUDIT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE OF  THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee of the Board of Directors is  composed of four members and acts under a written charter,  as amended and restated on June 14, 2016, a copy of which is  available in the Corporate Governance section of our Investor  Information webpage at www.staples.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of  the Audit and Finance Committee are independent Directors,  as defined by its charter and the rules of the Rule 10A-3 of the  Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and the applicable rules of  the NASDAQ Global Select Market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and independent registered public accounting firm, with and  without management present, to discuss the results of their  examinations, their evaluations of Staples internal controls,  and the overall quality of Staples financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee reviewed and discussed  with Ernst & Young LLP , Staples independent registered  public accounting firm, which is responsible for expressing  an opinion on the conformity of those audited consolidated  financial statements and related schedules with US generally  accepted accounting principles, its judgments as to the quality,  not just the acceptability, of Staples accounting principles  and such other matters as are required to be discussed  with the Audit and Finance Committee by the standards of  the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United  States) (PCAOB), including AS 1301 (Communications with  Audit Committees), the rules of the Securities and Exchange  Commission, and other applicable regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and  Finance Committee also received the written disclosures and  the letter from the independent registered public accounting  firm required by PCAOB Rule 3526, Communication with  Audit Committees Concerning Independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit  and Finance Committee discussed with the independent  registered public accounting firm the independent registered  public accounting firms independence from management and  Staples and considered the compatibility of non-audit related  services provided to Staples by the independent registered  public accounting firm with the independent registered public  accounting firms independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee provides independent,  objective oversight of Staples financial reporting process on  behalf of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has the primary  responsibility for the preparation, presentation and integrity of  Staples consolidated financial statements and for maintaining  an adequate system of disclosure controls and procedures and  maintaining effective internal control over financial reporting  for that purpose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling its oversight responsibilities, the  Audit and Finance Committee reviewed and discussed with  management the audited consolidated financial statements,  and related schedules, for the 2016 fiscal year, which review  included a discussion of the quality, not just the acceptability,  of the accounting principles, the reasonableness of significant  judgments, and the clarity of disclosures in the consolidated  financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee discussed with Staples  internal auditors and independent registered public accounting  firm the overall scope and plans for their respective audits.

sentences.text: How does the Board recommend that I vote and what is the requirement to approve each matter?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Matter Board  Recommendation Voting Approval  Standard* Effect of  Abstention Effect of Broker  Non-Vote Election of Ten Directors FOR each director  nominee Majority of  votes cast** No effect No effect Approval (on an advisory basis) of Named Executive  Officer Compensation FOR Majority of  votes cast*** No effect No effect Advisory vote on the frequency of future executive   compensation advisory votes 1 YEAR Majority of  votes cast***+ No effect No effect Approval of the Companys Amended and Restated   Executive Officer Incentive Plan FOR Majority of  votes cast No effect No effect Ratification of Ernst & Young LLP FOR Majority of  votes cast*** No effect Not applicable

sentences.text: What is a proxy and proxy statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between a shareholder of  record and a beneficial owner?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy is your legal designation of another person to vote the  shares you own.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The person you designate is called a proxy  or proxy holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you designate someone as your proxy in a  written document, that document also is called a proxy or a  proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy statement is the document that contains  the information the Securities and Exchange Commission  (SEC) rules require us to provide when we ask you to sign a  proxy designating individuals to vote on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These terms describe the manner in which your shares  are held.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name  through Computer Shareholder Services, our transfer agent,  you are a shareholder of record or registered shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If  your shares are held in street name through a bank, broker,  nominee or other shareholder of record, you are considered  the beneficial owner of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of record at the close of business on the record  date, April 17, 2017, are entitled to receive notice of the Annual  Meeting and to vote their shares of our common stock at the  meeting, or any postponement or adjournment of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of shares of our common stock are entitled to one  vote per share and individual votes will be kept confidential,  except as appropriate to meet legal requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the meeting, in person or by proxy, of a  majority of the shares of our common stock outstanding on  the record date will constitute a quorum, permitting business  to be conducted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the record date, [xx]  shares of our common stock were outstanding and entitled  to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies that are received and marked as abstentions  or left blank will be included in the calculation of the number  of shares considered to be represented at the meeting for  quorum purposes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can attend the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders as of the record date, or their duly appointed  proxies, may attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A government-issued  photo identification such as a drivers license, state-issued  ID card or passport, will be required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that if you  are a beneficial owner, you will also need to bring a copy of a  brokerage statement reflecting your stock ownership in Staples  as of the record date to be allowed into the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may  obtain directions to the location of our Annual Meeting by  writing, emailing or calling our Investor Relations department  at 500 Staples Drive, Framingham, Massachusetts 01702,  email: investor@staples.com, or telephone: (800) 468-7751.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if an incumbent director does not receive  the required number of votes for election?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an incumbent director does not receive the required number  of votes he or she is expected to promptly submit his or her  offer of resignation to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will then consider  the resignation and the action to be taken in accordance  with the procedures set forth in our Corporate Governance  Guidelines, within 90 days of the shareholder vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Company will publicly disclose the Boards decision, including  the Boards reasoning if the resignation is not accepted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If  the resignation is accepted, the Board may fill the resulting  vacancy in accordance with our by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see our  Corporate Governance Guidelines for more information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INFORMATION ABOUT THE ANNUAL MEETING, VOTING AND OTHER SHAREHOLDER MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The only matter at the 2017 Annual Meeting that is  discretionary is the ratification of our independent registered  public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The other matters are non- discretionary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper copy of these proxy materials, included  with such copy is a proxy card or a voting instruction card from  your bank, broker or other nominee for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If  you received a notice of Internet availability of proxy materials,  the notice will contain instructions on how to access and  review the proxy materials online and how to obtain a paper  or electronic copy of the materials, which will include the proxy  statement, the 2016 Annual Report and a proxy card or voting  instruction card, as well as instructions on how to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please instruct your broker how to vote your shares using the  voting instruction form provided by your broker or following  any instructions provided by your broker for voting your shares  over the Internet or telephonically, if available.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I sign and return my proxy or instruction form  but do not provide voting instructions?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote using any of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no choice is specified on a signed proxy card, the  persons named as proxies will vote in accordance with the  recommendations of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder, you may vote in person at  the meeting or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you decide to vote by proxy, you  may do so over the Internet, by telephone or by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change or revoke my proxy after I return my  proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After reading the proxy materials,  you may use a computer to access the website  www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be prompted to enter  your control number from your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This number  will identify you as a shareholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Follow the  instructions that will be given to you to record your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any proxy may be changed or revoked by a shareholder  at any time before it is exercised at the Annual Meeting by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting a properly signed proxy card with a later date  that is received at or prior to the Annual Meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After reading the proxy materials, you may  call (800) 690-6903 using a touch-tone telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You  will be prompted to enter your control number from your  proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This number will identify you as a shareholder  of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Follow the instructions that will be given to you  to record your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting a vote at a later time via the Internet or telephone;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending the Annual Meeting and voting in person; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delivering to our Corporate Secretary a written notice  of revocation, provided such statement is received at or  prior to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper copy of the proxy card by  mail, after reading the proxy materials, you may sign, date  and mark your proxy card and return it in the prepaid and  addressed envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner and hold shares in street name,  you may submit new voting instructions or revoke your  voting instructions by contacting your bank, broker or other  nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also change your vote or revoke your voting  instructions in person at the Annual Meeting if you obtain a  legal proxy from the record holder (bank, broker or other  nominee) giving you the right to vote the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner and you own shares that are  held in street name by a bank, broker or other nominee, you  will need to contact your bank, broker or other nominee to  determine whether you will be able to submit a proxy over the  Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Are there other matters to be voted on at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder as of the record date and  attend the meeting, you may personally deliver your completed  proxy card or vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you complete,  sign and return your proxy card, it will be voted as you direct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this proxy statement, our Board does not  know of any other matters which may come before the meeting,  other than the matters described in this proxy statement and  the deadline under our by-laws for submission of matters by  shareholders has passed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Should any other matter requiring  a vote of our shareholders arise and be properly presented at  the Annual Meeting, the proxy for the Annual Meeting confers  upon the persons named in the proxy and designated to  vote the shares discretionary authority to vote, or otherwise  act, with respect to any such matter in accordance with their  best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner, your bank, broker or other  nominee, as the record holder of your shares, is required to  vote our shares according to your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your bank,  broker or other nominee will send you directions on how to  vote those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name, you  must request a legal proxy from your bank, broker or nominee  if you would like to vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board encourages shareholders to attend the  Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend, you  are urged to submit your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prompt response will  greatly facilitate arrangements for the meeting and your  cooperation is appreciated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who attend  the Annual Meeting may vote their stock personally  even though they have sent in their proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are  a beneficial owner, you must request a legal proxy from  your bank, broker or nominee if you would like to vote in  person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a Broker Non-Vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker is entitled to vote shares held for a shareholder  on discretionary matters without instructions from the  shareholder of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if a shareholder does  not provide timely instructions, the broker does not have the  authority to vote on any non-discretionary proposals at the  Annual Meeting and a broker non-vote would occur.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicitation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All costs associated with preparing, assembling, printing, mailing, and distributing these proxy materials will be borne by Staples.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples will also bear the cost of soliciting proxies on behalf of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples will provide copies of these  proxy materials to banks, brokerage houses, fiduciaries, and  custodians holding in their names shares of our common stock beneficially owned by others so that they may forward  these proxy materials to the beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples has  retained the services of D.F. King & Co., Inc., a professional  proxy solicitation firm, to aid in the solicitation of proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples expects that it will pay D.F. King its customary fees, estimated not to exceed approximately $10,000 in the  aggregate, plus reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred  in the process of soliciting proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Staples may
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reimburse brokerage firms and other persons representing  beneficial owners of shares for their expenses in forwarding  solicitation materials to such beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicitations may also be made by personal interview, mail,  telephone, facsimile, email, Twitter, other electronic channels  of communication, in particular LinkedIn, Staples investor  relations website, Staples Annual Meeting website, located  at https://staplesannualmeeting.com, other Staples-hosted  websites and blogs, or otherwise by directors, officers, and  other employees of Staples, but Staples will not additionally  compensate its directors, officers, or other employees for  these services.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We did not receive any shareholder proposals or nominations  for director candidates that must be presented at our 2017  Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with our by-laws, in order for  a shareholder to present a proposal for a vote or nominate  a director candidate for election at our 2017 Annual Meeting  but not have such proposal included in the proxy materials,  the shareholder must have provided us with advance written  notice by March 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in Staples securities, agreements or compensation relating  to such nomination or matter, and any derivatives or other  arrangements to mitigate risk or change voting power.

sentences.text: If a  shareholder gives notice of such a proposal or nomination after  the applicable deadline, the shareholder will not be permitted  to present the proposal or nomination to the shareholders  for a vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For our 2018 Annual Meeting, our  Corporate Secretary generally must receive such a notice at  500 Staples Drive, Framingham, Massachusetts 01702 not  later than 90 days and no earlier than 120 days prior to the  first anniversary of our 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if the  date of our 2018 Annual Meeting is more than 30 days before  or more than 70 days after such anniversary date, notice by  the shareholder must be received no earlier than 120 days  prior to the 2018 Annual Meeting and not later than the later  of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the 90th day prior to the 2018 Annual Meeting and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the  tenth day following the day on which public announcement of  the date of the 2018 Annual Meeting is made or notice for the  2018 Annual Meeting was mailed, whichever occurs first.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who intend to present proposals at our 2018  Annual Meeting and want us to include such proposals in our  proxy materials relating to that meeting should contact our  Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such proposals must be received at our  principal corporate offices at 500 Staples Drive, Framingham,  Massachusetts 01702 not later than December 27, 2017 and  must be in compliance with applicable laws and Rule 14a-8  under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the Exchange  Act) in order to be considered for possible inclusion in the proxy  statement and form of proxy for our 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder wishes to present a proposal or nominate a director candidate for election at our 2018 Annual Meeting and  the proposal or nomination is not intended to be included in our proxy statement for such meeting, the shareholder must give us advance notice and provide the information required by our  by-laws, including but not limited to, information regarding the identity of the shareholder or beneficial owner, their holdings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under certain circumstances, shareholders may also submit  nominations for directors for inclusion in our proxy materials by  complying with the requirements of our proxy access by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information regarding proxy access, please see  the caption Director Candidates  Shareholder-Nominated  Director Candidates above.

sentences.text: Householding of Annual Meeting Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some banks, brokers and other nominee record holders may be participating in the practice of householding proxy statements, annual reports and notices of Internet availability of proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that only one copy of our proxy statement, annual report or notice of Internet availability of proxy materials may be sent to multiple shareholders in a household, which helps us reduce our printing costs and postage fees and helps the environment by conserving natural resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, we will promptly deliver a separate copy of these documents to you if you write, email or call our Investor
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Relations department at 500 Staples Drive, Framingham,  Massachusetts 01702, email: investor@staples.com, or  telephone: (800) 468-7751.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you want to receive separate  copies of the proxy statement, annual report or notice of  Internet availability of proxy materials in the future, or if you  are receiving multiple copies and would like to receive only  one copy for your household, you should contact your bank,  broker, or other nominee record holder, or you may contact us  at the above address, email or phone number.

sentences.text: APPENDIX A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amended and Restated Executive Officer Incentive Plan Fiscal Years 2017 - 2021
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I. Summary and Objectives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples, Inc. (Staples) has developed this Executive Officer Incentive Plan (the Incentive Plan) to provide opportunities for Plan Participants (as defined below) to earn financial  rewards for their role in ensuring that Staples meets its annual performance targets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Incentive Plan aims to align the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: interests of the Plan Participants with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bonus awards are based on actual results measured against  pre-established company financial objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bonus awards  are intended to provide a reward to Plan Participants and  supplement the base salary program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: II.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Term of Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Incentive Plan will cover five fiscal years (or portions  thereof), beginning with the 2017 fiscal year (beginning  January 29, 2017) and ending with the 2021 fiscal year (ending
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: January 29, 2022).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each such fiscal year or portion of a fiscal  year in which performance is measured under this Plan is  referred to herein as a Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: III.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provided that the Compensation Committee of the Board of  Directors (the Committee) determines that Staples meets the  applicable performance objectives for a particular Plan Period,  as set forth below, and all other eligibility requirements are  met, the following guidelines will be used to determine Plan  Participants bonus award eligibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as set forth in  Section III.D with respect to a Plan Participants death, bonus  awards are not guaranteed and will not be paid unless Staples  meets the required objectives set forth in the Incentive Plan  and the Committee authorizes the payment of bonus awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C. Leaves of Absence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Plan Participant who is on a company-approved leave of  absence in excess of 90 days during a Plan Period will not be  eligible for a bonus award for the portion of his or her leave  over 90 days unless otherwise approved by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D. Retirement, Disability or Death
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement: If a Plan Participant terminates his or her  employment after attaining age 55 and if at the time of such  termination of employment the sum of the years of service (as  determined by the Board of Directors of Staples) completed by  the associate plus the associates age is greater than or equal  to 65, the associate will be eligible for a prorated bonus award  based on the number of days the associate was employed by  Staples during the applicable Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A. General Eligibility Requirements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each executive officer of Staples, within the meaning of the rules  and regulations promulgated by the Securities and Exchange  Commission, will be eligible to participate in the Incentive Plan,  except that an executive officer whose employment terminates  prior to the end of a Plan Period, other than as a result of  permanent disability, death or retirement, will not be eligible to  receive a bonus award under the Incentive Plan for that Plan  Period (each a Plan Participant).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Disability: If a Plan Participants employment is terminated due  to permanent disability before the end of the Plan Period, the  associate will be eligible for a prorated bonus award based on  the number of days the associate was employed by Staples  during the applicable Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: B. Changes in Position
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Plan Participant who changes from one position to another  will be eligible for a prorated bonus award as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In each case described above, no prorated bonus will be  paid unless all of the applicable requirements set forth in the  Incentive Plan are met, including without limitation that the  Committee determines that Staples meets the applicable  performance objectives for a particular Plan Period and  authorizes the payment of bonus awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Plan Participant who transfers from an Incentive  Plan eligible position into a position eligible for another  bonus plan is eligible for a prorated bonus award under  the Incentive Plan based on the number of days the  associate was a Plan Participant during the applicable  Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The associates eligibility for a bonus for the  new position, if any, will be determined in accordance  with any applicable bonus plan for that position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Death: If a Plan Participants employment is terminated due  to death before the end of the Plan Period, 100% of the Plan  Participants Target Award for such Plan Period will be paid  within 60 days of such termination; provided, that if such  Plan Period does not cover the entire fiscal year, the amount  paid shall be annualized (with any amounts paid for previous  Plan Periods deducted); and provided, further, that if such  termination occurs during the Plan Participants first fiscal year  under the Incentive Plan, the bonus award will be prorated  based on the number of days the associate was employed by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan

sentences.text: Within the earlier of

sentences.text: (i) 90 days after the beginning of each Plan  Period and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the first 25% of the Plan Period, the Committee  will establish specific performance objectives for the payment  of bonus awards for that Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance  objectives for each Plan Period will be based on one or more  of the following measures, which may be determined on a  Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) or non- GAAP basis: sales, earnings per share, return on net assets,  return on equity, adjusted operating profit, free cash flow,  total shareholder return, net income, operating income and  customer service levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These performance objectives are  intended to establish the benchmark of success for Staples.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may determine that special one-time or  extraordinary gains or losses, including without limitation as  a result of certain acquisitions or divestitures and changes  in accounting principles, should or should not be included in  determining whether such performance objectives have been  met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, customer service target levels will be based  on pre-determined tests of customer service levels, including  without limitation scores on blind test (mystery) shopping,  customer comment card statistics, customer relations  statistics (e.g., number of customer complaints), delivery  response levels or customer satisfaction surveys conducted  by a third party.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each Plan Period, a specified percentage (which may vary  from Plan Period to Plan Period) of each Target Award (as  defined below) will be based upon each of the performance  objectives selected by the Committee for that Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For  each of the performance objectives, a specified percentage of  the portion of the Target Award that is based on that particular  performance objective will be paid based on the level of  performance achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each performance objective shall have  a threshold performance level that must be achieved for any of  the bonus award to be paid for such objective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum bonus award payable to an executive officer  for any fiscal year during the term of the Incentive Plan is  $4 million, with such amount proportionately allocated among  all Plan Periods within each such fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, but  subject to the preceding sentence, the Committee presently  intends to limit bonus awards to 200% of a Plan Participants  Target Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Plan Participant will have a target bonus award (a Target  Award) for each Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target Awards will be expressed  as a percentage of the actual base salary paid to the Plan  Participant during the Plan Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The percentages will be  determined by the Committee based on the Plan Participants  job level and responsibilities and may vary for different officers  or business units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan Participant were achieved and shall authorize payment by  Staples to the Plan Participant; provided that the Committee  may use negative discretion to decrease, but not increase,  the amount of any bonus award otherwise payable to a Plan  Participant.

sentences.text: payment of bonus awards to amend, terminate or discontinue  the Incentive Plan in whole or in part whenever it is considered  necessary.

sentences.text: The Incentive Plan will be administered by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Committee will have broad authority for determining target  bonuses and selecting performance objectives, as described  below; for adopting rules and regulations relating to the  Incentive Plan; and for making decisions and interpretations  regarding the provisions of the Incentive Plan, including  determining to what extent, if any, specific items are to be  counted in the relevant financial measures for any particular  business, the satisfaction of performance objectives and the  payment of awards under the Incentive Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Incentive Plan may be amended or terminated by either  the Board of Directors or the Committee, provided that  (1) no amendment or termination of the Incentive Plan after  the end of a Plan Period may adversely affect the rights of Plan  Participants with respect to their bonus awards for that Plan  Period, and (2) no amendment which would require stockholder  approval under Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue  Code may be effected without such stockholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D. Rights are Non-Assignable
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: B. Employment at Will
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither the Plan Participant nor any beneficiary nor any other  person shall have any right to assign the right to receive  payments hereunder, in whole or in part, which payments are  non-assignable and non-transferable, whether voluntarily or  involuntarily.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Incentive Plan does not create an express or implied  contract of employment between Staples and a Plan  Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both Staples and the Plan Participants retain the  right to terminate the employment relationship at any time and  for any reason.

sentences.text: VII.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forfeiture and Recovery for Misconduct
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recovery Period means (1) if the Misconduct relates to  Restatement Misconduct, or the Misconduct consists of acts  or omissions relating to Staples financial matters that in the  discretion of the Board are reasonably unlikely to be discovered  prior to the end of the fiscal year in which the Misconduct  occurred and the completion of the outside audit of Staples  annual financial statements, the period during which the Plan  Participant is employed by Staples and the period ending 18  months after the Plan Participants last day of employment; (2) if  the Misconduct relates to the breach of any agreement between  the Plan Participant and Staples, the term of the agreement  and the period ending six months following the expiration of  the agreement, and (3) in all other cases, the period during  which the Plan Participant is employed by Staples and the  period ending six months after the Plan Participants last day  of employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If during the Recovery Period the Board gives  written notice to the Plan Participant of potential Misconduct,  the Recovery Period shall be extended for such reasonable  time as the Board may specify is appropriate for it to make  a final determination of Misconduct and seek enforcement of  any of its remedies described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staples rights pursuant  to this Section VII shall terminate on the effective date of a  Change in Control (as defined in the Staples, Inc. 2014 Stock  Incentive Plan) and no Recovery Period shall extend beyond  that date except with respect to any Plan Participant for which  the Board prior to such Change in Control gave written notice  to such Plan Participant of potential Misconduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A. Right of Recovery
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this Incentive Plan  to the contrary, if the Board of Directors of Staples (or its  authorized designee, the Board) determines during the  Recovery Period (as defined below) that a Plan Participant has  engaged in Misconduct (as defined below), the Board, subject  to the limitations set forth in this Section VII, may in its sole  discretion (1) terminate such Plan Participants participation  in the Incentive Plan, or with respect to any award under the  Incentive Plan, and treat any outstanding award as forfeited,  (2) require forfeiture, in whole or in part, of payment of any  award that has been previously approved for payment under  this Incentive Plan which remains in whole or in part unpaid,  and/or (3) demand that the Plan Participant pay to Staples  in cash the amount described in Section VII.B.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ; provided,  however, that in the event the Board determines during  the Recovery Period that the Plan Participant engaged in  Misconduct as described in clause (D) of the definition of  Misconduct) (Restatement Misconduct), the Board shall in all  circumstances, in addition to any other recovery action taken,  require forfeiture and demand repayment pursuant hereto.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
